original_title: WCW Clash of The Champions VIII: Fall Brawl '89
overview: Clash of the Champions VIII took place on September 12, 1989 at the Carolina Coliseum in Columbia, South Carolina. There were 2,600 fans in attendance and the show drew a 4.7 rating on TBS. This show was used to build the first ever Halloween Havoc PPV on October 28.
title: WCW Clash of The Champions VIII: Fall Brawl '89
